recipe_name: Goats' cheese and sun-blushed tomato salad
author: Lesley Waters
method: Heat a griddle pan until smoking, then brush with the oil. Place the cheese onto the griddle and cook for two minutes on each side. Meanwhile mix together the remaining ingredients in a bowl, then place onto a serving plate. To serve, place the griddled goats' cheese on top of the salad.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil, plus extra to grease,  100g/3½oz round goats' cheese, cut in half,  ½ tsp cracked black pepper,  small bunch fresh basil,  small bunch fresh coriander,  55g/2oz sun-blushed tomatoes, chopped,  ½ tsp balsamic vinegar
